_sText:
DON"T UNDERRATE THIS MAP!
A real brilliant, improved with help of Kesserd092. Thank you, friend, you made these ideas possible!!!

Anyways, the game-play is more fun now, more balanced and now it's a bomb defuse map.

Just try it, guys, you will love it. Good for AWP lovers.  

PS. Final fixes might be coming with an Update within 24 hours.
